```{r echo=TRUE}

data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/solujan/diplo-datos/master/AnalisisYCuracion/input/Pokemon.csv",header=TRUE)
data <- data[-1]
print(data)

```

```{r echo=TRUE}
data[, 6:10]
```
```{r}
install.packages("magrittr") # only needed the first time you use it
install.packages("dplyr")    # alternative installation of the %>%
library(magrittr) # need to run every time you start R and want to use %>%
library(dplyr)    # alternative, this also loads %>%
```


```{r echo=True}

#data_filtered <- data[data$Type.1 == 'Fire',]
df1 <- data %>%
 filter(data$Type.1 == 'Fire' || data$Type.1 == 'Grass')

plot(df1[,6:7], col = df1$Type.1, pch = 18, main = "Pokemon type Dataset")
```
